job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-12T12:03:18.000Z", "description": "

We are seeking a site reliability engineer (SRE) to build and manage highly reliable data platform infrastructure and applications. Specifically, we are searching for someone who brings fresh ideas, demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint, and enjoys collaborating with world-class engineers to develop big data solutions and deliver positive user experiences at every interaction.


RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Build software and systems to manage platform infrastructure and applications
  • Continuous automation of operational processes
  • Provide primary operational support and engineering for suite of SaaS tools
  • Intervene and remediate when systems and services deviate significantly from normal levels
  • Work with release engineers to ensure that the software delivery pipeline is as efficient as possible


PREFERRED PROFILE:

  • 3-5 years of relevant experience in operating
  • BS/MS in Computer science or equivalent
  • medium-scale distributed system in a cloud environment
  • Experience in Kubernetes, Hadoop and Docker containers
  • Experience in (CI/CD) - Jenkins, Concourse tools
  • Experience in AWS Cloud, Server-less technologies
  • Experience in building and deploying automation using scripting/ programming languages
